original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1326)@</color>投擲出武器對敵方全體武將重複打擊 ，並以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(616)@ x 9</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>造成物理傷害且燃燒 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(106)@</color> 秒，同時在地上留下持續 <color=#ccffcc>10</color> 秒的火焰。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1326)@</color> Throw a weapon to repeatedly attack all enemy generals, and use <color=#ccffcc> $Skill_Str(616)@ x 9</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage and burns <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(106)@</color> seconds, while staying on the ground The flame lasts for <color=#ccffcc>10</color> seconds.
